text: Radka Bártová (born 16 July 1990) is a Slovak former competitive figure skater. She is the 2006 Karl Schäfer Memorial bronze medalist and 2007 Slovak national champion. She competed in the final segment at three ISU Championships – the 2005 World Junior Championships in Kitchener, Ontario, Canada; 2006 World Junior Championships in Ljubljana, Slovenia; and 2007 European Championships in Warsaw, Poland. Bártová trained in Košice, Prešov, and Trebišov, coached by Hana Tőcziková and Miriam Lipčáková. == Programs == {|class=wikitable style=text-align:center ! Season ! Short program !
